title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.21 - Reimbursement for adoption expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.21 - Reimbursement for adoption expenditures

State Regulations

Expenditures made by a social services district for
adoption services and their administration will be subject to reimbursement in
accordance with the provisions of section
153-i
of
the Social Services Law: (a) the
amount of Federal funds, if any, properly received or to be received on account
of such expenditures; and
(b) subject to the availability of State funds, 75 percent of its expenditures for
adoption services and their administration, after first deducting therefrom any

Federal funds received or to be received on account thereof, and any
expenditures defrayed by private contributions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
421.21

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
